title: Red lentil, squash and ginger soup
description: A thick, warming soup made with just three ingredients plus stock and seasoning.  For this recipe you will need a blender.
ingredients: 7.5cm/3 inch piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely grated
300g/10½oz butternut squash flesh, cut into 1cm/½-inch cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
